code: const SUMMER_MONTHS=[6,7,8,9];const WINTER_MONTHS=[12,1,2];const SPRING_MONTHS=[3,4,5];const AUTUMN_MONTHS=[10,11];export const isSummerMonth=()=>{const currentMonth=new Date().getMonth()+1;return SUMMER_MONTHS.includes(currentMonth);};export const isWinterMonth=()=>{const currentMonth=new Date().getMonth()+1;return WINTER_MONTHS.includes(currentMonth);};export const isSpringMonth=()=>{const currentMonth=new Date().getMonth()+1;return SPRING_MONTHS.includes(currentMonth);};export const isAutumnMonth=()=>{const currentMonth=new Date().getMonth()+1;return AUTUMN_MONTHS.includes(currentMonth);};export const applySeasonalAdjustment=(odds,betType,value)=>{if(isSummerMonth()){if(betType==='rain'&&value>0){return value<=1?odds*1.5:odds*1.8;}if(betType==='rain_yes'){return odds*1.8;}if(betType==='rain_no'){return odds*0.8;}if(betType==='wind'&&value>20){return odds*1.3;}if(betType==='temperature'&&value>30){return odds*0.8;}}if(isWinterMonth()){if(betType==='rain'&&value>0){return value<=3?odds*0.7:odds*0.8;}if(betType==='rain_yes'){return odds*0.7;}if(betType==='rain_no'){return odds*1.2;}if(betType==='wind'&&value>30){return odds*0.8;}if(betType==='temperature'&&value<14){return odds*1.2;}}if(isAutumnMonth()){if(betType==='rain'&&value>0){return value<=5?odds*0.6:odds*0.7;}if(betType==='rain_yes'){return odds*0.6;}if(betType==='rain_no'){return odds*1.4;}if(betType==='wind'&&value>25){return odds*0.9;}}if(isSpringMonth()){if(betType==='rain'&&value>0){return value<=3?odds*0.9:odds;}if(betType==='rain_yes'){return odds*0.9;}if(betType==='rain_no'){return odds*1.1;}if(betType==='wind'&&value>25){return odds*0.9;}}return odds;};export const getRainOdds=mm=>{let baseOdds;if(mm===0||mm<0.01){baseOdds=1.15;}else if(mm<=1){baseOdds=3.5;}else if(mm<=3){baseOdds=5.0;}else if(mm<=5){baseOdds=8.0;}else if(mm<=10){baseOdds=15.0;}else if(mm<=15){baseOdds=25.0;}else if(mm<=20){baseOdds=40.0;}else if(mm<=30){baseOdds=60.0;}else if(mm<=40){baseOdds=100.0;}else if(mm<=50){baseOdds=150.0;}else if(mm<=75){baseOdds=250.0;}else if(mm<=100){baseOdds=500.0;}else{baseOdds=1000.0;}return applySeasonalAdjustment(baseOdds,'rain',mm);};export const getRainYesOdds=()=>{const baseOdds=4.0;return applySeasonalAdjustment(baseOdds,'rain_yes',1);};export const getRainNoOdds=()=>{const baseOdds=1.15;return applySeasonalAdjustment(baseOdds,'rain_no',0);};export const getTemperatureOdds=temp=>{let baseOdds;if(isSummerMonth()){if(temp<20){baseOdds=8.0;}else if(temp<=25){baseOdds=3.0;}else if(temp<=30){baseOdds=1.5;}else if(temp<=35){baseOdds=2.0;}else if(temp<=40){baseOdds=5.0;}else{baseOdds=15.0;}}else if(isWinterMonth()){if(temp<8){baseOdds=10.0;}else if(temp<=12){baseOdds=3.0;}else if(temp<=16){baseOdds=1.8;}else if(temp<=20){baseOdds=2.5;}else if(temp<=25){baseOdds=6.0;}else{baseOdds=15.0;}}else if(isSpringMonth()){if(temp<12){baseOdds=6.0;}else if(temp<=16){baseOdds=2.5;}else if(temp<=20){baseOdds=1.8;}else if(temp<=25){baseOdds=2.0;}else if(temp<=30){baseOdds=4.0;}else{baseOdds=10.0;}}else{if(temp<12){baseOdds=7.0;}else if(temp<=16){baseOdds=3.0;}else if(temp<=20){baseOdds=1.7;}else if(temp<=25){baseOdds=2.2;}else if(temp<=30){baseOdds=5.0;}else{baseOdds=12.0;}}return applySeasonalAdjustment(baseOdds,'temperature',temp);};export const getWindOdds=speed=>{let baseOdds;if(speed<=5){baseOdds=2.5;}else if(speed<=10){baseOdds=1.8;}else if(speed<=15){baseOdds=2.0;}else if(speed<=20){baseOdds=2.5;}else if(speed<=25){baseOdds=3.5;}else if(speed<=30){baseOdds=5.0;}else if(speed<=40){baseOdds=8.0;}else if(speed<=50){baseOdds=15.0;}else if(speed<=60){baseOdds=30.0;}else if(speed<=75){baseOdds=60.0;}else if(speed<=90){baseOdds=120.0;}else{baseOdds=250.0;}return applySeasonalAdjustment(baseOdds,'wind',speed);};export const getCurrentSeason=()=>{if(isSummerMonth()){return"Verano";}else if(isWinterMonth()){return"Invierno";}else if(isSpringMonth()){return"Primavera";}else{return"Otoño";}};export const getSeasonalBettingDescription=()=>{const season=getCurrentSeason();if(season==="Verano"){return"Verano en Málaga: Cuotas muy altas para lluvia, altas para viento fuerte, bajas para temperaturas elevadas.";}else if(season==="Invierno"){return"Invierno en Málaga: Cuotas más bajas para lluvia, moderadas para viento, altas para temperaturas bajas.";}else if(season==="Primavera"){return"Primavera en Málaga: Cuotas moderadas para lluvia, ligeramente reducidas para viento, equilibradas para temperatura.";}else{return"Otoño en Málaga: Cuotas muy bajas para lluvia (temporada de lluvias), moderadas para viento y temperatura.";}};
